Handling Errors¶

Missing Sample_Project or Sample_Id¶

Missing Sample_Project

Missing Sample_Id

You can fix either of these errors by editing the SampleSheet.csv file either with the Illumina Experiment Manager or any text editor. Simply fill in the missing value for the indicated field.

e.g:

Updating Sample_Id

Updating Sample_Project

Sample_Project doesn’t exist in IRIDA¶

Check the Sample_Project field for the given Sample_Id in the error message to make sure that there are not typos in it. If the Sample_Project is correct then contact an IRIDA admin.

Sample_Id does not match Sample_Name¶

Edit the SampleSheet.csv file to make Sample_Id and Sample_Name be the same values.

Note: If the Sample_Name was left blank then it is automatically filled in with the same value as it’s Sample_Id.
